member.name: ICredentialProviderCredential2.GetUserSid
member.summary: Retrieves the security identifier (SID) of the user that is associated with this credential.
member.param: The address of a pointer to a buffer that, when this method returns successfully, receives the user's SID.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICredentialProviderCredential2
member.summary: Extends the interface by adding a method that retrieves the security identifier (SID) of a user. The credential is associated with that user and can be grouped under the user's tile.
